p: A preliminary phytochemical analysis was conducted to identify the main chemical classes. In general, qualitative differences were not observed, characterized by a higher presence of phenols/tannins and absence of alkaloids, amino acids and saponins ( Table 2). However, there were found differences in relative concentrations of the chemical classes. Coumarins and triterpenes/steroids were more evident in PmI and PmC, respectively; while reducing sugars appeared with higher concentrations in both PmI and PmC samples.
